name: 100k tax trap - allowance fully eliminated (£125,140)
description: Single person earning £125,140 - the exact threshold where the personal allowance is fully eliminated (£12,570 ÷ 0.5 = £25,140 above £100k). Beyond this, the 60% trap ends and normal higher rate (40%) applies.

sources.description: Manual calculation verified using UK tax bracket rules
